org.grules.script
[Groovy] Class RulesBinding

java.lang.Object
  groovy.lang.GroovyObjectSupport
      groovy.lang.Binding
          org.grules.script.RulesBinding

class RulesBinding
extends groovy.lang.Binding

Encapsulates script variables. The VariablesBinding class handles parameters dirty/clean values and parameters groups.

Constructor Summary
RulesBinding()

RulesBinding(java.util.Map variables)

@param variables script variables

Adds variables to a script environment.
void addGroupParametersVariables(java.lang.String group)

Adds variables for direct access to parameters of the group group, i.e. that a group prefix can be omitted.

Returns clean values for all clean parameters.
java.util.Map fetchNotValidatedParameters()

Fetches parameters that were not validated by the rules script.

Returns only parameters variables.

Checks if property is a parameter dirty value.

Checks if a value of parameter parameterName from the group group is part of the input.
static java.lang.String parseDirtyParameterName(java.lang.String dirtyValueVariableName)

Returns name of a parameter represented by dirty parameter variable dirtyValueVariableName.
